text.tspan: one puny galaxy at a time!

flowRoot.flowPara: Like all Open Source projects, Thousand Parsec is continually in need of new developers.
Almost everyone, even those who can't code and contribute to Thousand Parsec!
* Artists, Who can produce either 3d or 2d artwork
* Coders, Who can code in Python, C++ or PHP
* Testers, Anyone who can file a bug report!
Thousand Parsec is a tool set for building space empire building games. (Often called 4 X games, eXplore, eXpand, eXterminate, eXploit.)

It has been designed to allow different servers to run their own custom ruleset. If you wish to clone Stars! or VGA Planets you can. If you want to make a Star Trek or Star Wars themed universe you can.

Thousand Parsec also supports long term games with players joining and leaving throughout the game. The whole game can even be modified during play including adding new technologies and even order types.
Thousand Parsec currently has one fully playable mini-ruleset and another one well on the way.
